translations.translation: Like precious gems of ruby and pearl.
who are as beautiful as rubies and pearls.
They are like rubies and coral-stone.
They are like Yaqut and Marjan.
As though they were rubies and pearls.
lovely as rubies, beautiful as coral --
(In beauty) like the jacynth and the coral-stone.
[There will be] maidens as fair as corals and rubies.
As though they are jacinth and coral.
As though they were rubies and corals.
(In beauty) they are like rubies and coral.
As (lovely as) rubies and as (beautiful as) coral.
As though they were rubies and corals.
As if they were rubies and coral.
[55:58] It is as though they are rubies, in their purity, and pearls, in their fairness.
(In beauty) like the jacynth and the coral stone.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { كَأَنَّهُنَّ } من كمال الصفاء الشفاء والجلاء { ٱلْيَاقُوتُ وَٱلْمَرْجَانُ } [الرحمن: 58] المسرتان لأرباب النظر والعيان، { فَبِأَيِّ آلاۤءِ رَبِّكُمَا تُكَذِّبَانِ } [الرحمن: 59]

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
